result.arabic_text: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ قَآئِمَةٞ فَضَحِكَتۡ فَبَشَّرۡنَٰهَا بِإِسۡحَٰقَ وَمِن وَرَآءِ إِسۡحَٰقَ يَعۡقُوبَ
result.translation: N’umugore we (Sara) yari ahagaze (inyuma y’urusika abumva), maze araseka (atangajwe n’ibyo yumvise). Nuko tumuha inkuru nziza yo kuzabyara Is’haqa (Isaka), na nyuma Is’haqa (akazabyara) Yaqub (Yakobo).
